Even the unicorns have been corrupted by the ill wind that blows through the Fey Forest. I know Lillix had some luck helping Seravy, but the other unicorns are too fragile to survive such a transition.

I see your eyes, . You think we don't realize how tragic it is to kill the {@LinkCreature:2#6#sullen} and {@LinkCreature:2#56#feral} unicorns? The only thing more tragic...is to let them live.

The unicorns' pure spirits could not endure such corruption. But they say a little bit of each unicorn remains in its horn.

Who knows? In time perhaps we can coax those spirits out of those horns and give them a way to gallop through the forest again!
Bring back the unicorns' horns, <PCNAME>...after you've done what must be done.
